CustomField.description: When out prospecting and in the area on the above accounts, prospect: ABC Supply - sign up stores and once signed you should be scheduling demo days to display the bag. Home Depot (Houston) Contractors - try to target high volume contractors who can provide volume. Small Builders - small builders are a niche markets and high value. Small builders like the ease of BB as well as easy placement. Roofers - Target roofers for the second half of the install, its where we add value. Kitchen & Bath - Plumbers - target plumbers that also do restorations like root router.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Retail Stores Contractors Small Builders Roofers Kitchen & Bath Plumbers
CustomField.label: Other Accounts/Goal/Update
